DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study was to compare between the safety and efficacy of the harmonic shears and the commonly used clip technique in achieving safe closure and division of the cystic duct in the laparoscopic cholecystectomy in day surgery setting
DOC.brief_title: Clipless Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy Using Harmonic Scalpel Versus Conventional Method in Day Surgery
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic Cholelithiasis Age under 65 yr old BMI under 35 ASA I or II Acute cholecystitis Suspect of common bile duct stones
